step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands in your lap. Keep your elbows close as you begin to raise them.
You're doing well raising your hands toward your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head as you spread them wide.
Great job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding steady! Ensure your elbows remain spread wide and your head stays upright.
Nicely done reversing the motion. Try to maintain the elbow spread and upright head position as you return to the start.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Keep your head up and avoid pulling forward for best results.
